item.title: Meta 预见未来：人工智能将满足您的社交需求
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，莱利-格里芬（Riley Griffin）将从 Meta 反垄断审判中报道该公司对竞争对手的看法以及社交网络的未来。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Riley Griffin reports from the Meta antitrust trial about the company’s views of its rivals and the future of social networks.】

item.title: 关税冲击减弱，停滞不前的首次公开募股（IPO）被吸引离场
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收的关税干扰了股市，股市的强劲反弹重新点燃了全球的首次公开募股（IPO）活动，因为没有直接贸易风险的企业希望在夏季来临之前，在地缘政治紧张局势再次爆发之前完成交易。【原文：The stock market’s striking rebound from the tariff disruption imposed by US President Donald Trump has rekindled global IPO activity, as businesses without direct exposure to trade look to get deals done before the summer — and before geopolitical tensions flare up again.】

item.title: 美国贸易部长在韩国会见同行讨论关税问题
item.description: 几个月前，当韩国计划召开亚太经合组织贸易部长会议时，一些高级官员起初并不指望能成行。【原文：When South Korea was planning the APEC Trade Ministerial meeting a few months ago, some top officials initially weren’t expected to make the trip.】

item.title: 中美贸易冲突有可能使欧洲成为倾销地
item.description: 我是马尔科姆-斯科特，驻悉尼的国际经济企业编辑。今天，詹姆斯-梅杰（James Mayger）和威廉-霍洛宾（William Horobin）将探讨人们对中国廉价商品将涌入欧洲并刺激该地区保护主义抬头的担忧。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您尚未注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击此处。【原文：I’m Malcolm Scott, international economics enterprise editor in Sydney. Today, James Mayger and William Horobin look at concerns cheap Chinese goods will flood Europe and spur increased protectionism in the region. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 印度股市创七个月新高，信实银行和 HDFC 银行大涨
item.description: 印度股市周四飙升至 10 月份以来的最高水平，基准 NSE Nifty 50 指数的周度期权到期引发了剧烈的盘中波动。【原文：Indian stocks surged to their highest level since October on Thursday, with the expiry of weekly options on the benchmark NSE Nifty 50 Index triggering sharp intraday movements.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯警告金融体系仍面临贸易风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）告诫说，近期的贸易动荡仍有可能危及该地区的金融体系，迄今为止，该体系已经经受住了美国政策突然转变所带来的影响。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos cautioned that the recent trade turmoil could still upend the region’s financial system, which has so far weathered the fallout from the abrupt shifts in US policy.】

item.title: 波兰引领东欧第一季度经济增长
item.description: 在私人消费的推动下，波兰经济在今年前三个月的增长速度是东欧最快的。【原文：Poland’s economy expanded the fastest in Eastern Europe in the first three months of the year, driven by private consumption.】

item.title: 马拉维力争在大选后第三次获得国际货币基金组织（IMF）协议的眷顾
item.description: 马拉维一直在努力跟踪国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）的项目，这些项目带来了急需的资金，在过去五年中，马拉维曾两次未能完成这些项目。马拉维政府计划在 9 月大选后重新努力。【原文：Malawi has had a tough time keeping track of its International Monetary Fund programs that bring in much-needed financing, failing twice in the last five years to conclude them. The government plans a fresh effort after the September elections.】

item.title: 受关税威胁影响，爱尔兰三月份对美出口飙升 395
item.description: 统计局称，3月份爱尔兰对美国的出口额同比增长了394.9%，其中医疗和医药产品的出口额增长了394.9%。【原文：The value of exports from Ireland to the US rose 394.9% in March from a year earlier, on medical and pharmaceutical goods, the statistics office said.】

item.title: 马云支持的蚂蚁金服利润因人工智能和新业务成本下降 31
item.description: 蚂蚁金服集团公司（Ant Group Co.【原文：Ant Group Co.’s quarterly profit fell 31% as the firm invested in artificial intelligence and other initiatives to bolster revenue growth.】

item.title: 阿联酋航空正与马斯克的 SpaceX 公司洽谈在航班上使用星际链路的事宜
item.description: 阿联酋航空正在与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 SpaceX 公司商讨，以全面改造该航空公司的互联网服务，这家全球最大的国际航空公司正寻求加强其机上 Wi-Fi 服务。【原文：Emirates is in discussions with Elon Musk’s SpaceX to overhaul the carrier’s internet service as the world’s largest international airline looks to enhance its in-flight Wi-Fi.】

item.title: 摩根大通全球市场主管称美国可能躲过经济衰退
item.description: 摩根大通银行全球市场战略主管表示，美国可能会躲过经济衰退，因为随着全球贸易局势的进一步明朗，出现这种情况的可能性已经降低。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s chief of global markets strategy said the US could dodge a recession as the probability of that scenario has decreased following better clarity over global trade.】

item.title: 梅洛尼希望在下一次预算中再次削减意大利的工资税
item.description: 意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）所在政党的经济部长表示，意大利政府希望在来年再发放一次福利，以减轻中产阶级的收入负担。【原文：Italian Premier Giorgia Meloni’s government wants to ease the burden on middle-class earnings with another giveaway in the coming year, according to the economics chief of her political party.】

item.title: 普利司通希望通过提价和增加美国产量来应对关税
item.description: 普利司通公司正在美洲扩大生产，并考虑提高价格以抵消关税带来的影响。【原文：Bridgestone Corp. is expanding production in the Americas and considering raising prices to offset the impact from tariffs.】

item.title: 侠盗猎车手》延期未能打击 Take-Two 投资者的热情
item.description: Take-Two Interactive Software Inc.的投资者不会像之前计划的那样看到最新的《侠盗猎车手6》游戏在今年上架，但这并没有影响对该公司股票的情绪。【原文：Investors in Take-Two Interactive Software Inc. won’t see the latest Grand Theft Auto VI game hit the shelves this year like previously planned, but that isn’t souring sentiment on the stock.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴业绩未达预期，消费者复苏希望破灭
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）的季度营收不及预期，反映出中国消费者持续低迷，以及在人工智能这一关键领域的激烈竞争。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s quarterly revenue missed projections, reflecting a persistent Chinese consumer downturn as well as intense rivalry in the critical field of AI.】

item.title: 卢布创两年新高，期待与乌克兰举行伊斯坦布尔会谈
item.description: 俄罗斯货币兑美元汇率升至两年来的最强水平，因为谈判代表已抵达土耳其，预计这将是莫斯科和基辅自 2022 年以来的首次直接会谈，而且国内对外币的需求也有所下降。【原文：Russia’s currency rose to its strongest level against the dollar in two years as negotiators arrived in Turkey for what are expected to be the first direct talks between Moscow and Kyiv since 2022 and domestic appetite for foreign-currency dropped.】

item.title: 美元疲软助推货币波动性异常飙升
item.description: 美元贬值抬高了全球货币套期保值交易的价格，打破了市场长期以来的信念，即当美元疲软时，成本往往会下降。【原文：The dollar’s descent is elevating the price of hedging currency trades around the world, breaking up a long-standing market conviction that costs tend to come down when the greenback weakens.】

item.title: LG 化学寻求 10 亿美元购买可兑换成 LG 能源解决方案股票的债券
item.description: 韩国 LG 化学有限公司正在寻求筹集 10 亿美元的债券，这些债券可以兑换成 LG 能源解决方案有限公司的股票，用于为另一次发行的债券再融资。【原文：South Korea’s LG Chem Ltd. is seeking to raise $1 billion in bonds that can be exchanged for shares in LG Energy Solution Ltd. to refinance another issuance.】

item.title: 期权专业人士放弃 S&P 500 对冲，因为反弹迫使他们改弦更张
item.description: 对于股票期权交易商来说，贪婪现在已经牢牢取代了恐惧，因为他们预期美国股市将从上个月的深度反弹中延续反弹，因此纷纷投入看涨头寸。【原文：For equity-options traders, greed now has firmly replaced fear as they dive into bullish positions on expectations that US stocks will extend their rebound from the depths seen last month.】

item.title: 日本生命停止向银行销售部门派遣员工
item.description: 日本生命保险公司将停止临时派遣员工到银行等其他公司销售部门工作的做法，因为这种安排可能会扭曲公平竞争。【原文：Nippon Life Insurance Co. will discontinue the practice of temporarily sending employees to work in sales departments of other firms such as banks, judging that the arrangements may distort fair competition.】

item.title: 墨西哥银行有望降息半个百分点
item.description: 墨西哥周四可能将维持货币政策宽松的步伐，降息半个百分点，因为经济显示出长期疲软的迹象，通胀在目标范围之内。【原文：Mexico will likely maintain the pace of monetary policy easing Thursday, offering up a half-point rate cut as the economy shows signs of prolonged weakness with inflation inside the target range.】

item.title: 银行并购升温，CaixaBank 和 Sabadell 完成风险转移
item.description: 在西班牙金融业整合之际，CaixaBank SA 和 Banco Sabadell SA 正在完成重大风险转移，以腾出资金用于发展。【原文：CaixaBank SA and Banco Sabadell SA are finalizing significant risk transfers to free up capital for growth amid consolidation in the Spanish financial industry.】

item.title: 日本显示器公司首席执行官辞职，宣布在亏损膨胀后裁员
item.description: 日本显示器公司（Japan Display Inc.【原文：Japan Display Inc.’s CEO is stepping down and the company is slashing around half its headcount after it posted fresh losses that extended a seven-year streak.】

item.title: 欧元区年初经济增长低于初步报告
item.description: 欧元区经济在 2025 年初的增长速度低于最初报告的速度，即使在美国征收关税之前，预计未来几个月的经济活动也会受到影响。【原文：The euro-area economy expanded less than initially reported at the start of 2025, even before US tariffs that are expected to sap activity in the months ahead.】

item.title: 特朗普的减税草案掩盖了美国债务面临的真正巨大威胁
item.description: 根据一项官方估算，共和党立法者的全面减税计划草案在未来 10 年的成本为 3.8 万亿美元。据包括前共和党工作人员在内的独立分析人士称，由于使用了旨在尽量减少表面上的财政打击的预算和政治工具，实际情况可能要高得多。【原文：The cost of Republican lawmakers’ draft plan for sweeping tax cuts weighed in at $3.8 trillion over the next 10 years in one official estimate. The reality is likely much higher, thanks to the use of budget and political tools designed to minimize the appearance of the fiscal hit, according to independent analysts including former Republican staff members.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚大选给债券投资者带来垃圾级风险
item.description: 在经历了几个月的政治动荡之后，投资者将罗马尼亚的欧元债券与垃圾级债务相提并论，而现在周末的总统投票又给罗马尼亚的货币和地方债务带来了新的风险。【原文：Investors are treating Romania’s eurobonds on par with junk-rated debt after months of political turmoil, and now the weekend’s presidential ballot brings fresh risks for the currency and local debt as well.】

item.title: 阿布扎比建筑公司据称将利用 FAB 和汇丰银行上市
item.description: 阿拉伯建筑公司（Arabian Construction Co.）已选择阿布扎比第一银行（First Abu Dhabi Bank）和汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）为其计划在阿联酋进行的首次公开募股提供顾问服务，这使得寻求在该国蓬勃发展的房地产市场中套现的公司数量激增。【原文：Arabian Construction Co. has picked First Abu Dhabi Bank and HSBC Holdings Plc to advise on a planned initial public offering in the United Arab Emirates, adding to the rush of firms seeking to cash in on the country’s booming property market.】

item.title: 印度人在发表支持巴基斯坦的言论后放弃土耳其旅行计划
item.description: 旅游网站的数据显示，在土耳其和阿塞拜疆发表声明支持巴基斯坦之后，印度人正在退出前往这两个国家的旅行。【原文：Indians are backing out of trips to Turkey and Azerbaijan, data from travel websites show, after the two nations issued statements supporting Pakistan during heightened conflict between the South Asian rivals.】
